post.title: Tape Deck for PC
post.content: Back in college, I used to DJ for KSCR, USC’s student run radio station. I’ve got a bunch of old cassette of my “work”. Now, with the PlusDeck, I could actually install a tape deck in a free 5.25″ drive bay of my home computer. But for $150, I think I’d rather just plug my old tape deck from the garage into the sound card.

comments.name: mearls@hotmail.com (Michael Earls)
comments.content: Very cool! This will be going into my CarPC. That was one thing that I wasn’t looking forward to losing – the tape deck. Laurie loves to listed to books on tape that she checks out from the library. This is awesome!
